author: cms-btv-pog
body:
First version of a tagger that extracts the charge of b-jets.

Based on MVA mathod, GBRForest (default) or TMVA
Exploits pfImpactParameterTagInfos, pfInclusiveSecondaryVertexFinderTagInfos, softPFMuonsTagInfos and softPFElectronsTagInfos
Two tagging variables added to softPFMuonsTagInfos and softPFElectronsTagInfos

Rebase of #12952

@aboletti
title: b-jet charge tagger
